items.text: now he gets the desired result. Gets elevation and distance. Charges down to get to the pitch, makes sure to leave enough room and follows up with a clean swing of the arm straight over long-on
items.shortText: de Silva to Mahmudullah, SIX runs

items.text: drops a fuller ball in front of point for a quick one. Brings up the fifty of the stand
items.shortText: de Silva to Mahmudullah, 1 run

items.preText: Joker: "Unlike the fantastic five, who except Shakib, started with a lot of flair and hang on, the youngsters are mostly getting hidden in to the oblivion after them. Bangladesh needs to put a lot of emphasis into domestic cricket to have a sustainable future."
items.text: fullish, sliding into his pads and Mahmudullah is slightly tucked up. Slower ball as well, not picked by the batsman and Mahmudullah lofts it into the air. Thisara Perera runs forward from long-on, takes a while to settle under it, and it remains in the air for a long, long time. But Perera has judged it perfectly for a superb catch
items.shortText: Pradeep to Mahmudullah, OUT

dismissal.text: Mahmudullah c NLTC Perera b Pradeep 24 (23b 2x4 1x6) SR: 104.34

items.text: legcutter, lands halfway down and well out of his reach. Spins away further as well but well away from Rahim's reach
items.shortText: Pradeep to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full toss, punched straight to mid-off but they chance his arm for a single
items.shortText: Pradeep to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: short of a length, climbs onto him very slowly, waits and steers to square third man
items.shortText: Pradeep to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.text: legcutter, spins away like one, slapped to the left of sweeper cover
items.shortText: Pradeep to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: short, but not short enough. And it's slower as well so that minimises the bounce, Sabbir sways out of the line and lets it go outside off
items.shortText: Pradeep to Sabbir Rahman, no run

items.text: yorker, angling in on middle and leg, some late inward movement, dug out back to the bowler
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: full outside off, clears the front leg and hammers it through the covers. It beats two fielders. Extra cover running to his left, and then sweeper running and diving to his right but not able to flick it back
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: bowled him. Good delivery. A yorker on middle. Rahim gets down for a slog and makes no contact as he is tucked up and the ball cuts in late to clatter into leg stump
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mushfiqur Rahim, OUT

dismissal.text: Mushfiqur Rahim  b NLTC Perera 62 (52b 4x4 1x6) SR: 119.23

items.preText: Perera bowling with a very sling-arm action now.
items.text: full outside off, pushed through extra cover
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mashrafe Mortaza, 1 run

items.text: yorker, angling in on middle and leg, dug out to midwicket
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.text: full, hammered straight back and knocks down the stumps at the non-striker's end
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: turns it away with the angle to backward square leg
items.shortText: Pradeep to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.text: short of a length, a legcutter at 111.6ks, swivels and pulls and the ball goes one-bounce to deep square leg
items.shortText: Pradeep to Mashrafe Mortaza, 1 run

items.text: shortish and too much width this time, Rahman slaps it straight past the bowler. Another legcutter, picked up early
items.shortText: Pradeep to Sabbir Rahman, FOUR runs

items.text: full, on the pads, clipped to deep backward square leg
items.shortText: Pradeep to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.text: backs away to a full toss and carves it away over point. Sweeper runs to his left and dives and flicks it back but then dives over it and touches the ropes while still under it
items.shortText: Pradeep to Mashrafe Mortaza, FOUR runs

items.text: seemed like a six but this one's been plucked at the deep square leg boundary. Another short ball but slower again and Mortaza hammers a pull, Dananjaya runs to his left and takes it reverse-cupped in front of the boundary. Made it look easy but it was anything but
items.shortText: Pradeep to Mashrafe Mortaza, OUT

dismissal.text: Mashrafe Mortaza c Dananjaya b Pradeep 6 (5b 1x4 0x6) SR: 120.00

items.text: goes for a scoop but closes the face early and skews a low full toss off the splice to short third man
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.text: yorker, angles in towards middle and Perera goes up in appeal as the ball's squeezed out towards point. Perera thinks it's pad first, and they take the review. And he's right. It's hit him flush on the boot. Question is if it's in line with the stumps.The angle was pretty sharp. Ho, that's hitting the middle part of middle stump. Just straightened down that channel
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Nasir Hossain, OUT

dismissal.text: Nasir Hossain lbw b NLTC Perera 0 (1b 0x4 0x6) SR: 0.00

items.text: very full on the stumps, worked to point
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mohammad Saifuddin, 1 run

items.text: some reverse swing again. Tails in very late from a full length, pushed down the ground
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Sabbir Rahman, 1 run

items.text: now it tails away. Another yorker, curves away on middle from outside leg, drilled back
items.shortText: NLTC Perera to Mohammad Saifuddin, no run
